Name: Caligula_attack07
Text_English: Caligula begins a powerful whirlpool of darkness.
Text_Korean: 칼리굴라가 강력한 어둠의 소용돌이를 시전 합니다.

Name: Lilith_Attack05
Text_English: The release brings up [Forest Spiders].

Name: Lilith_Attack06
Text_English: Lilith summons the swamp of forest suffering.

Name: Beelzebufo_Attack04
Text_English: Belzebub gives off his defense.

Name: Beelzebufo_Attack08
Text_English: Belzebub begins a powerful brain battle.
Text_Korean: 벨제부브가 강하게 휘몰아치는 뇌전을 시전 합니다.

Name: Nidhogg_Attack05
Text_English: Needhog prepares for the breath of chloride.

Name: Apocalypse_Rage_Attack05
Text_English: Apocalypse is about to explode the power of darkness.

Name: Apocalypse_03_Attack08
Text_English: Apocalypse is about to explode the power of destruction.

Name: Harang_Attack08
Text_English: We will launch a surprise attack on the Harang level.
Text_Korean: 하랑이 차원의 기습 공격을 시전 합니다.

Name: Sargon_P1_Attack04
Text_English: Sargon prepares for frozen heavy rain.

Name: Sargon_P2_Attack04
Text_English: Sargon prepares for the breath of cold air.

Name: Sargon_P2_Attack06
Text_English: Prepare for a storm that rages with Sargon.

Name: Caligula_QTE
Text_English: You have to destroy the Soulstone to damage Caligula.
Text_Korean: 소울스톤을 파괴해야 칼리굴라에게 데미지를 입힐 수 있습니다.

Name: Caligula_QTE_01
Text_English: Caligula summons Soulstone.

Name: Magnus_Summon
Text_English: Magnus summons the elite troops.

Name: Daniel_Summon
Text_English: Daniel summons Jeanne and Darc.

Name: Stone_Red
Text_English: The magma stone emits a flame oura. [Released when destroyed]
Text_Korean: 마그마스톤이 화염 오오라를 발산합니다. [파괴 시 해제]

Name: Stone_Yellow
Text_English: The Powerstone will demonstrate invincible Oura. [Released when destroyed]
Text_Korean: 파워스톤이 무적 오오라를 시전합니다.  [파괴 시 해제]

Name: Stone_Green
Text_English: Poisonstone gives off an addictive aura. [Released when destroyed]
Text_Korean: 포이즌스톤이 중독 오오라를 발산합니다. [파괴 시 해제]

Name: Stone_Purple
Text_English: Destruction of the Death Stone will take the enemy breath away. [If you destroy it kill the monster]
Text_Korean: 데스스톤 파괴 시 적들의 숨을 빼앗습니다. [파괴 시 몬스터 처치]
